description:
Thin plate spline smoothers are a special case of the isotropic splines discussed in Duchon (1977). A subset of this more 
general class can be invoked by terms like s(x,z,bs="ds",m=c(1,.5) in a gam model formula.
In the notation of Duchon (1977) m is given by m[1] (default value 2), while s is given by m[2] (default value 0).
